TopicTitle: Game no longer loads; always ends in either a crash or a blue screen

Articles.Content:
I’ve got 16 hours of play time, but can’t add to it anymore as the game crashes every single time without fail.

 

I’ve tried loading my current saves, making new ones, verifying files, uninstalling and reinstalling, shutting down my pc, nothing works. I get to the main menu, but when I load a save, old or new, the game crashes at “pumping sim once” in the loading screen. 
I I have the fps on screen while this happens, and it goes from 30 to 20 to 10 to 1 to 0.5 within a 10-5 second window, and then it crashes.

Seems that the next time I’ll be able to play the game is after the first patch, assuming that even fixes it.

 

specs are 11th gen Intel i7 igpu, 3 GHz, 16gb ram, which is obviously below the minimum specs on gpu, but this wasn’t an issue for the first 16 hours, but it is now and it’s incredibly frustrating.
Same issue. Specs are i7-12700H, 32gb DDR5 ram, 3070Ti. Game is running off of an SSD.
